DOC.brief_summary: Feasibility newly program offline application smartphones ( SPA , APP ) colonoscopy preparation offer 5 day guidance prior colonoscopy contain dietary- behavioral recommendation .
DOC.brief_title: Improvement Colonoscopy Preparation New Media ( APP )
DOC.detailed_description: First feasibility test newly program app/SPA android system name Colopr-APP . It strictly offline work , autonomous system download smartphone . It create 5-day guidance prior outpatient colonoscopy dietary behavior recommendation .
DOC.criteria: outpatient colonoscopy smartphone owner android system chronic renal failure anticoagulant pregnancy diabetes mellitus ( IDDM )
